mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, b.board_title, b.board_contents, b.board_created_at, b.board_modified_at, b.is_board_deleted, b.board_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.board_id = #{ boardId } AND b.is_board_deleted = 'N'
SELECT s3_url FROM attachment WHERE board_id = #{ board_id }
SELECT board_category_id, board_category_name FROM board_category WHERE parent_board_category_id = #{ categoryId }

SELECT b.board_id, b.board_title, u.nickname, b.board_created_at FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.is_board_deleted = 'N' AND b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE is_board_deleted = 'N' AND user_id = #{userId}
